content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The SAP Customer Experience (CX, including SAP Commerce Cloud/Hybris) CC’s team of the SAP CX portfolio drives SAP CX (Hybris) talent and SAP CX projects through thought leadership, innovation, and best practices. It aims to give SAP CX (Hybris) talent and SAP CX projects the tools, processes, and vision necessary to delight EPAM’s clients as a value-add partner.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We concentrate our efforts on developing expertise in all SAP products that belong to SAP CX portfolio.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":151474,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f780440e-28c8-46db-a945-2b0d6500c78a/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f780440e-28c8-46db-a945-2b0d6500c78a/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f780440e-28c8-46db-a945-2b0d6500c78a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029.02783203125,\"height\":508.27486287073066},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
